nodes.text: The Blenjeel system was a star system located in the Dufilvian sector of the galaxy's Mid Rim that contained the planet Blenjeel, homeworld of the sand burrowers.

The Blenjeel system was originally created for Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy, a Star Wars Legends first- and third-person shooter developed by Raven Software and released on September 16, 2003. It was first identified in The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, which placed the system in grid square Q-15.
